message:
Geeks, we develop full-motion virtual reality games, and we started a crowdfunding campaign that will end in hours, we need your support and contributions if you like what we do
Watch the video...
Check the rewards...
Pledge either online or cash...

Here's our page:
Facebook.com/EpicVR.net
story: Ahmed Atif shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: EpicVR
caption: tennra.com
description: In EpicVR, our vision is to build a virtual reality theme park where imagination has no limits, imagine yourself living the world of a battlefield where you & your friends are military special forces.
